example.text: News from Representative Luria Dear Friends, It has been an honor of my life to represent Coastal Virginia in Congress. Over the past four years, I have worked tirelessly with Republicans and Democrats to support our active-duty service members and military families, expand lifesaving health care services and benefits for our veterans, increase investments in defense to strengthen our military, secure historic infrastructure legislation, lower prescription drug costs for working families, and protect our democracy from all enemies, foreign and domestic.
